pr_title: Allow a user choose a path when a Thrift/gRPC service has more than one path

timeline.message: Allow a user choose a path when a Thrift/gRPC service has more than two paths
Allow a user choose a path when a Thrift/gRPC service has more than two paths

timeline.bodyText: Question: can we do concatAndDedup for the queries as well?
timeline.author: minwoox
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -333,7 +333,7 @@ private ServiceInfo addServiceExamples(ServiceInfo service) {
                         // generated by the plugin.
                         concatAndDedup(exampleHeaders.get(m.name()), m.exampleHeaders()),
                         concatAndDedup(exampleRequests.get(m.name()), m.exampleRequests()),
-                        examplePaths.get(m.name()),
+                        concatAndDedup(examplePaths.get(m.name()), m.examplePaths()),
                         exampleQueries.get(m.name()),

timeline.bodyText: How about removing this constructor because it's unstableApi and not used anymore?
timeline.author: minwoox
kojilin
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -333,8 +333,8 @@ private ServiceInfo addServiceExamples(ServiceInfo service) {
                         // generated by the plugin.
                         concatAndDedup(exampleHeaders.get(m.name()), m.exampleHeaders()),
                         concatAndDedup(exampleRequests.get(m.name()), m.exampleRequests()),
-                        examplePaths.get(m.name()),

+                        concatAndDedup(examplePaths.get(m.name()), m.examplePaths()),

replies.bodyText: Oops I think we can just do distinct().collect(toImmutableList());
replies.author: minwoox
